settings.style: futuristic elegance, luminous alien architecture, cinematic calm

prompts.text: A vast hall with floating crystal lights. Human delegates and Anari beings sit in concentric circles, surrounded by soft golden illumination.
Golden light patterns swirl through the air, forming visual sentences. Holographic displays in front of humans translate them in real time.
Close-up shots of human faces reacting emotionally — tears, wonder, awe — against a glowing, ethereal background.
Two human groups face each other tensely. One is hopeful, the other skeptical, standing apart beneath alien murals.
Father Martinez stands alone in front of the Anari council. He speaks calmly, golden energy threads respond with pulsing light.
A massive, floating sphere projects stars, memories, alien civilizations — a visual record of galactic history fills the chamber.
An energetic sigil glows above everyone in the room, symbolizing the formation of an interspecies alliance.
Sarah, Aida, and Daryl wear new, minimalist uniforms with glowing symbols representing their unity and leadership.
The group stands before a panoramic space window, gazing into the stars. They look solemn, determined, and ready.
